係你加左好友之後

揀一張卡起手就啱架啦，超過二千經驗值

免費石呀！！！
點觸遊戲介面以下地方可獲得數量1、3、5顆不等的石頭。
1.噴水池：出現噴水彩虹
2.街燈：發出彩虹光
3.商店上方卡片：出現禮物汽球
4.垃圾桶：出現強慾之壺
獲得一定時間過後可再次點觸獲得。

quote.msg:
想問下你地打路人會唔會*2/*3?
打KC/階級決鬥係咪冇成本?
基本上狂打就得?

replies.msg:
會用 x3，因為升經驗快
不過因為每次最多只會開8個箱，所以如果高過3000分已經會浪費左1個箱
因為3000x3=9000分，每1000分跌1個箱
所以新手用 x2 好 D，不過玩耐左已經冇咩所謂，因為大部分箱都係出垃圾

KC/ 階級狂打就得，開荒期打多D唔錯
因為都送幾多石or卷，有部分實用卡都可以靠SR/UR卷換

quote.msg: 新手嚟計，依家應該抽啲常用坑先？

replies.msg:
一次過答哂你

新手冇話升邊個先 其實Depends on你想用既deck嚟揀人升 譬如你玩白龍deck要配粉碎 咁就升海馬等等有呢個技既人物 唔知自己套deck配咩技好？上嚟問又得 自己上網查下又得

每個角色送既咭都唔同 不妨㗰少少時間睇哂佢 再諗諗自己想將啲石投資落邊個方向
冇方向都唔緊要 逐個升到LV 20左右先 因為頭20都好快升完 升完你手上已經有一大堆石 之後就睇下自己想追張獎勵咭慢慢升埋佢

新手嚟計 如果你打算重課當然抽哂啲泛用咭先 響咭表度你可以搵到有邊啲人氣咭 嗰度可以縮窄你抽咭既範圍

就我個人嚟講都係覺得新手以追完整一套deck做目標會好啲 分散投資只會搞到自己幾頭唔到岸
譬如話而家興古巨基 就重點投資落去先 睇下要啲咩咭 響邊包有 先好用啲石投資落去 咩都抽啲到頭嚟只會發覺自己咩都砌唔到出嚟

呢隻係一隻就算課金都未必勁得好多既遊戲 齊咭唔一定贏硬 戰術同牌品同運氣先係重點

quote.msg: 新手嚟計，依家應該抽啲常用坑先？

一次過答哂你

新手冇話升邊個先 其實Depends on你想用既deck嚟揀人升 譬如你玩白龍deck要配粉碎 咁就升海馬等等有呢個技既人物 唔知自己套deck配咩技好？上嚟問又得 自己上網查下又得

每個角色送既咭都唔同 不妨㗰少少時間睇哂佢 再諗諗自己想將啲石投資落邊個方向
冇方向都唔緊要 逐個升到LV 20左右先 因為頭20都好快升完 升完你手上已經有一大堆石 之後就睇下自己想追張獎勵咭慢慢升埋佢

新手嚟計 如果你打算重課當然抽哂啲泛用咭先 響咭表度你可以搵到有邊啲人氣咭 嗰度可以縮窄你抽咭既範圍

就我個人嚟講都係覺得新手以追完整一套deck做目標會好啲 分散投資只會搞到自己幾頭唔到岸
譬如話而家興古巨基 就重點投資落去先 睇下要啲咩咭 響邊包有 先好用啲石投資落去 咩都抽啲到頭嚟只會發覺自己咩都砌唔到出嚟

呢隻係一隻就算課金都未必勁得好多既遊戲 齊咭唔一定贏硬 戰術同牌品同運氣先係重點

Dear Konami Company,

I am the player who the total number of packs opened already achieved 14000 & 12000 respectively, I want to complain about the game environment, please improve it to protect the property of players.


I want to complain about the game environment, please improve it to protect the property of players.

Firstly, the deck-systems about KOA'KI MEIRU has been unfair for other decks, even be other Tier 1 decks. It is because almost players would be used the skill of Grit, when the KOA'KI MEIRU players would be played in first round, almostly they would not put down any cards and bet they would not be died under the skill of Grit.

After the opponent players finished all progress in second round, almostly the KOA'KI MEIRU players would depend on the type of deck of opponent players, then diciding the targeted-cracking method: if the opponent deck is Vampire with a lot of special summon monster, the KOA'KI MEIRU players would summon KOA'KI MEIRU URNIGHT and then special summon KOA'KI MEIRU ICE or only summon KOA'KI MEIRU ICE, finally the special summon monsters from opponent players would be destroyed easily after sending 1 hand-card to graveyard from KOA'KI MEIRU ICE. In the same case, the KOA'KI MEIRU players may summon/special summon KOA'KI MEIRU SANDMAN or KOA'KI MEIRU WALL to crack opponent player's core-spell/trap card during the deal.

Most horrble, if the KOA'KI MEIRU players can get the Hey, Trunade!, they almost immediately activate the Hey, Trunade! to ignore the spell and/or trp cards from opponent players, then using the combo from previous paragraph.

Generally, most players placed 3 IRON CORE OF KOA'KI MEIRU & 3 DIAMOND CORE OF KOA'KI MEIRU respectively, from 20 cards deck with starting hand-cards as 4 or 5, it is so easily for getting these 2 cards or one, then the KOA'KI MEIRU players can expand tactics to achieve the combo from previous paragraph.

When the players put 3 KOA'KI MEIRU URNIGHT in the decks, who can be easily get the card and expand to special summon a KOA'KI MEIRU monster from the deck. Even the players has not IRON CORE OF KOA'KI MEIRU in the hand before summoning KOA'KI MEIRU URNIGHT, the players can use DIAMOND CORE OF KOA'KI MEIRU to add 1 KOA'KI MEIRU card from the deck to hand, almost be IRON CORE OF KOA'KI MEIRU for the expansion of effect of KOA'KI MEIRU URNIGHT.

Most importantly, the KOA'KI MEIRU MAXIMUS also be easily special summoned by removing IRON CORE OF KOA'KI MEIRU under the condition as getting with high probability, then the monster can select and destroy 1 card the opponent controls, finally one 3000 attack monster can be easily beat the opponent with getting win.

Please provide some effective methods for encountering the extremely bad circumstance.
